Text: Zeila & Lughaya State, or Saylac & Lughaya State, officially the Zeila & Lughaya State of Somalia, (Somali: "Maamul Goboleedka Saylac & Lughaya ee Soomaaliya" ), is a region in northwestern Somalia.

Text: Zeila & Lughaya State:  It later united with Lugayhe to form the "State of Sayla and Lugayhe".

Text: Zeila & Lughaya State:  Its main city is Zeila, which is situated on the coast.
